html

<button class="button button--success button--failure">
  Press Me-success
</button>

scss

// _button-base.scss
@import '../styles/global/colors';

@import 'states/cta';

@import 'states/failure';
@import 'states/success';
@import 'states/warning';

%button {
    @extend %button-base;
    @include background-with-hover($color-primary, darken($color-primary, 15%));
    border:     1px solid $color-primary;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    color:      $color-text-primary;
    cursor:     pointer;
    height:     50px;
    padding:    15px;
    transition: background-color 200ms ease-in;
    width:      150px;
}

// button.scss
@import '../base/colors';
@import '../base/mixins';
@import './button-base';

.button {
    @extend %button;
}

.form-text__button {
    @extend %button;
    margin: 5px;
    width:  100%;
}

.menu__button {
    @extend %button;
    @include background-with-hover(lighten($color-primary, 15%), lighten($color-primary, 35%));
    height:  25px;
    padding: 5px;
}

.sub-menu__button {
    @extend %button;
    @include background-with-hover($color-background-primary, lighten($color-primary, 45%));
    border:  1px solid $color-primary;
    color:   $color-text-secondary;
    height:  25px;
    padding: 2px;
    width:   100px;
}

// _notification-state.scss
@import '../../styles/global/mixins';

@mixin notification-state($color) {
    @include background-with-hover($color, darken($color, 25%));
    border: 1px solid $color;
}

// _cta.scss
@import '../../styles/global/colors';
@import '../../styles/global/mixins';

%button-base {
    &.button--cta {
        @include background-with-hover(lighten($color-primary, 15%), lighten($color-primary, 35%))

    }
}

// _failure.scss
@import '../../styles/global/colors';
@import '../mixins/notification-state';

%button-base {
    &.button--failure {
        @include notification-state($color-failure);

        &.sub-menu__button {
            @include background-with-hover($color-background-primary, lighten($color-failure, 25%));
            border: 1px solid $color-failure;
        }
    }
}

// _success.scss
@import '../../styles/global/colors';
@import '../mixins/notification-state';

%button-base {
    &.button--success {
        @include notification-state($color-success);

        &.sub-menu__button {
            @include background-with-hover($color-background-primary, lighten($color-success, 25%));
            border: 1px solid $color-success;
        }
    }
}

// _warning.scss
@import '../../styles/global/colors';
@import '../mixins/notification-state';

%button-base {
    &.button--warning {
        @include notification-state($color-warning);

        &.sub-menu__button {
            @include background-with-hover($color-background-primary, lighten($color-warning, 25%));
            border: 1px solid $color-warning;
        }
    }
}

css

.button--cta.button, .button--cta.form-text__button, .button--cta.menu__button, .button--cta.sub-menu__button {
    background-color: #409fcf;
}

.button--cta.button:hover, .button--cta.form-text__button:hover, .button--cta.menu__button:hover, .button--cta.sub-menu__button:hover {
    background-color: #91c8e3;
}

.button--failure.button, .button--failure.form-text__button, .button--failure.menu__button, .button--failure.sub-menu__button {
    background-color: #e25c59;
    border: 1px solid #e25c59;
}

.button--failure.button:hover, .button--failure.form-text__button:hover, .button--failure.menu__button:hover, .button--failure.sub-menu__button:hover {
    background-color: #a01f1c;
}

.button--failure.sub-menu__button {
    background-color: #fff;
    border: 1px solid #e25c59;
}

.button--failure.sub-menu__button:hover {
    background-color: #f5c7c6;
}

.button--success.button, .button--success.form-text__button, .button--success.menu__button, .button--success.sub-menu__button {
    background-color: #61e26c;
    border: 1px solid #61e26c;
}

.button--success.button:hover, .button--success.form-text__button:hover, .button--success.menu__button:hover, .button--success.sub-menu__button:hover {
    background-color: #1ea52a;
}

.button--success.sub-menu__button {
    background-color: #fff;
    border: 1px solid #61e26c;
}

.button--success.sub-menu__button:hover {
    background-color: #cdf6d0;
}

.button--warning.button, .button--warning.form-text__button, .button--warning.menu__button, .button--warning.sub-menu__button {
    background-color: #e2e180;
    border: 1px solid #e2e180;
}

.button--warning.button:hover, .button--warning.form-text__button:hover, .button--warning.menu__button:hover, .button--warning.sub-menu__button:hover {
    background-color: #b8b72a;
}

.button--warning.sub-menu__button {
    background-color: #fff;
    border: 1px solid #e2e180;
}

.button--warning.sub-menu__button:hover {
    background-color: #fafae8;
}

.button, .form-text__button, .menu__button, .sub-menu__button {
    background-color: #27749b;
    border: 1px solid #27749b;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    color: #fff;
    cursor: pointer;
    height: 50px;
    padding: 15px;
    transition: background-color 200ms ease-in;
    width: 150px;
}

.button:hover, .form-text__button:hover, .menu__button:hover, .sub-menu__button:hover {
    background-color: #18465e;
}

.form-text__button {
    margin: 5px;
    width: 100%;
}

.menu__button {
    background-color: #409fcf;
    height: 25px;
    padding: 5px;
}

.menu__button:hover {
    background-color: #91c8e3;
}

.sub-menu__button {
    background-color: #fff;
    border: 1px solid #27749b;
    color: black;
    height: 25px;
    padding: 2px;
    width: 100px;
}

.sub-menu__button:hover {
    background-color: #badcee;
}
